notes: Kroger and Meijer Stores have made a commitment to local schools by partnering with Enviro-bag.  Participating schools collect certain plastic grocery sacks not only to help the environment, but also to raise funds. Residents can call Enviro-Bag directly to find out what schools in their area are participating in the program at 800-866-3954.  Schools that are interested in participating in this fundraising/environmental program can do so by calling Enviro-bag at 1-800-866-3954 or by connecting online at www.envirobag.com.
